name: any_value
description: Returns any value from the group

name: array_size
description: Returns number of elements in array

name: dateadd
description: Adds the specified value for the specified date or time part to a date, time, or timestamp.

name: datediff
description: Calculates the difference between two date, time, or timestamp expressions based on the date or time part requested. The function returns the result of subtracting the second argument from the third argument.

name: is_null_value
description: Tests if variant is SQL NULL

name: startswith
description: Tests if string starts with prefix

name: to_timestamp_ntz
description: Converts to timestamp without time zone

name: to_timestamp_ltz
description: Converts to timestamp with local time zone

name: to_timestamp_tz
description: Converts to timestamp with time zone

name: try_to_timestamp_ntz
description: Safe timestamp without time zone conversion

name: try_to_timestamp_ltz
description: Safe timestamp with local time zone conversion

name: try_to_timestamp_tz
description: Safe timestamp with time zone conversion

name: get_path
description: Extracts value from VARIANT using path

name: get
description: Extracts value from OBJECT using key
